Module c195.c195assessment
Package c195.c195assessment.helper

Class FormHelper

java.lang.Object
c195.c195assessment.helper.FormHelper
public abstract class FormHelper extends Object
Contains utility methods for manipulating and retrieving data from form elements within the application. This includes converting date and time selections into LocalDateTime objects, populating ComboBox with time options, formatting date and time for display in TableColumn, and validating form inputs.

  • Method Details

    • getDateTimeFromForm

      public static LocalDateTime getDateTimeFromForm(javafx.scene.control.DatePicker datePicker, javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> timeComboBox)
      Combines the selected date from a DatePicker and the selected time from a ComboBox into a LocalDateTime object.
      Parameters:
      datePicker - The DatePicker from which to retrieve the selected date.
      timeComboBox - The ComboBox from which to retrieve the selected time as a string.
      Returns:
      The combined LocalDateTime representation of the selected date and time.

    • populateTimeComboBoxes

      public static void populateTimeComboBoxes(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> comboBox, int intervalInMinutes)
      Populates a ComboBox with time options at a specified interval within business hours, converted to the user's local time zone.
      Parameters:
      comboBox - The ComboBox to populate.
      intervalInMinutes - The interval, in minutes, at which to generate time options.

    • setupDateTimeColumn

      public static <T> void setupDateTimeColumn(javafx.scene.control.TableColumn<T,LocalDateTime> column)
      Configures a TableColumn to display LocalDateTime values formatted according to a specific pattern.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the items contained within the table view.
      Parameters:
      column - The TableColumn to configure.

    • isInputEmpty

      public static boolean isInputEmpty(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField, String inputName)
      Validates whether a TextField has been left empty and displays an alert if so.
      Parameters:
      textField - The TextField to check.
      inputName - The name of the input field, used for generating the alert message.
      Returns:
      true if the input is empty, false otherwise.

    • isInputEmpty

      public static boolean isInputEmpty(javafx.scene.control.DatePicker datePicker, String inputName)
      Validates whether a DatePicker has been left without a selected date and displays an alert if so.
      Parameters:
      datePicker - The DatePicker to check.
      inputName - The name of the input field, used for generating the alert message.
      Returns:
      true if no date is selected, false otherwise.

    • isInputEmpty

      public static <T> boolean isInputEmpty(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<T> comboBox, String inputName)
      Validates whether a ComboBox has been left without a selected option and displays an alert if so.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the items contained within the combo box.
      Parameters:
      comboBox - The ComboBox to check.
      inputName - The name of the input field, used for generating the alert message.
      Returns:
      true if no option is selected, false otherwise.
